Package org.carrot2.util.xsltfilter

XSLT processor servlet filter.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddHeaderFilter
    A servlet filter that adds/ sets a HTTP header to matching URIs.
    XSLTFilter
    A servlet filter applying XSLT stylesheets to the result of a request.
    XSLTFilterConstants
    A public class with several constants used in the XSLT filter.
